title: Late Night Lit: Jo Piazza & Christine Pride | Gillian Laub
description:
On today's episode of our books podcast, Late Night's Sarah Jenks-Daly speaks with Jo Piazza & Christine Pride, authors of the novel We Are Not Like Them. She also talks to photographer and filmmaker Gillian Laub about her new book Family Matters.
